post:
Virtual Private Servers are the mid level solution for those that need the control of a root based server.

At Domainsatcost.com we have been offering reliable and affordable hosting services since 2006, from our in house Datacenter located in New Jersey, USA. Providing everything from Domain Registrations to Dedicated Servers.

Our OpenVZ VPS plans start at only $5.00 a month and with a higher billing cycle you can be eligible for a lifetime discount.

**OpenVZ Starter**  
2 CPU Cores  
RAM - 768 MB  
Disk Space - 30 GB  
Bandwidth - 1000 GB  
Port speed - 100 Mbit  
**Monthly price $5**

**Features Included:**  
24x7 Live Support   
99.99% Uptime Guarantee  
Full Root/Administrator Access  
Latest Linux Control Panels  
Free Migration / IPv6 available  
Secure, isolated containers with 100mbit link  

Central America, EU and US IPs available.

No Setup or hidden Fees, 99.99% guaranteed uptime, 24/7 live support (English and Spanish), No contract necessary and Free Migration.

For further information visit: [http://domainsatcost.com/](http://domainsatcost.com/)
Email: sales@domainsatcost.com, julie.griffith@domainsatcost.com
